file_content.text: You people are gonna protect me from Salarr, right?
Agh! Jedi scum. I'll kill you... someday....
You have a real knack for making friends.
I told you to stay put, Padawan.
You shouldn't be here, Kira.
What, I'm supposed to stand out there forever? Unlikely.
I didn't come here to make friends.
That wasn't my mission.
Could've fooled me....
He sure killed my stealth field generator. Oh well--it was fun while it lasted.
Isn't teamwork grand?
You handled yourself like a true Jedi, Kira.
You did well, Padawan.
Wait, I need a holo of that. I want to play it back for Master Kiwiiks.
I don't see our doctor anywhere.
No sign of Tarnis.
This was all me.
No sign of Doctor Tarnis. Kinda puts a damper on things.
We were the decoys. Now you'll never see your little doctor again.
Is that so? Give me a minute with this guy. I'll make him talk.
You have one minute. Talk fast.
Do it quickly.
If nothing else, this'll be entertaining.
Be my guest.
Thanks for the encouragement.
I'm the Jedi here. I'll ask the questions.
No, I'll handle this.
Go ahead. You'll get nothing. The boss would kill me for talking.
Tell us where Doctor Tarnis is. We'll make sure no one gets to you.
You'll be protected.
You can't even protect your own people. I ain't saying nothing.
Thing is, we don't need him to talk. Not when I can just read his mind....
What? Stop that! Get out of my head! Get out!
The doctor's in the Black Sun headquarters! Salarr has him! Just leave me alone!
Cheap thugs'll believe anything. I can't read your mind, stupid.
You liar! You tricked me!
That was wrong, Kira. This is why you're not a full Jedi.
And disobeyed me.
But I... forget it. Doesn't matter.
Hate to say it, but that was actually pretty good.
Nice one, Kira.
Told you I'd make him talk.
You're out of line. Disobey my orders again and you're done. Got it?
That's enough, Padawan!
Sorry. Just trying to help. Won't happen again.
You... you tricked me?
Smooth, Kira. Very smooth.
Nice work, Kira.
That's not how a Jedi treats prisoners, Kira.
That was wrong, Padawan.
You just wish you'd thought of it first.
If she hadn't, you'd be dealing with me right now.
Consider yourself lucky.
He already talked. There's no need to play "light Jedi, dark Jedi" with him.
Your boss will send someone to silence you, anyway. We're your only hope.
[Persuade] You're not safe.
The boss will be furious I got caught. He might even... fine, you win.
Who's in a better position to kill you? Your boss... or me?
I'll kill you first.
Oh, so you're that kind of Jedi. Good to know.
Wait... I don't want to die.
I'm with the Black Sun. My boss Salarr sent us to grab your doctor and bring him to our headquarters. That's all I know.
Black Sun is a major crime syndicate. Whatever they want with Tarnis, we'd better save him quick.
Me and my security detail will clean this up. Agent Galen will want to hear about this.
